text: WEVL (89.9 FM) is a Memphis, Tennessee, radio station with a freeform format. It airs live in Memphis and online. ==Awards== * WEVL voted "Best FM Station" in Memphis Flyer's "Best of Memphis" 2007 poll. * WEVL takes second place for Best FM Station in the Memphis Flyer's 2006 Best of Memphis Poll ==Notable personalities== * Joyce Cobb * Dee "Cap'n Pete" Henderson * "Bashful Bob" * Jim "The Ol' Ridge Runner" Lillard ==See also== *List of community radio stations in the United States ==References== ==External links== *WEVL Radio official website *Listen Live * * * EVL Category:Freeform radio stations Category:Radio stations established in 1976 Category:1976 establishments in Tennessee Category:Community radio stations in the United States
title: WEVL
